name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a detail-oriented QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a strong proficiency in API testing and data validation, ensuring high-quality standards in large datasets comparison. My expertise includes working with **Postman** and **Newman** for thorough REST API assessments, while also utilizing **Cypress**, **Playwright**, and **Jest** as automation frameworks for efficient testing processes. 
I have a solid background in software development with modern **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, which enhances my ability to collaborate closely with development teams. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in implementing CI/CD pipelines and working with various AI tools to optimize quality assurance workflows.
With a commitment to maintaining data quality and adherence to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, I continually strive to elevate testing practices within the healthcare and financial sectors.
